game.name: Nezori
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 여우 소녀와 늑대 소녀의 세계에서 여우 소녀가 되어 전설 속 온천을 찾아 떠나는 귀여운 액션 RPG 모험에 뛰어드세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Embark on a cute action RPG adventure as a fox girl searching for the legendary hot springs in a land of fox and wolf girls!
